title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Video-Based Education Process for Home Care Management of Liver Transplant Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and chronic disease management experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can accurately explain liver transplant patients' home care procedures with over 90% precision using educational videos
Learners can practice core nursing skills—such as medication management, infection prevention, and dietary control—through video scenario-based simulations
Through video content, learners can apply patient monitoring and emergency response methods with over 80% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
